title: Cannot log in to the alpha client
body:
So I'm not sure how i reached this point entirely, but this is what happens currently:

I will start up the alpha client, then get this message - 

http://puu.sh/rMBg5/5336757acc.jpg

I click okay, then get this - 

http://puu.sh/rMBiB/f1733ff070.jpg

I click restart, then this - 

http://puu.sh/rMBtE/3570273b32.jpg 

which never changes

or if I'm not fast enough (which sometimes happens really quickly) this appears - 

http://puu.sh/rMBsk/a3019833ad.jpg

followed by the above

Other than re-downloading the client (i have really small download limits so i would liek to avoid that if possible) How would i fix this? If i can't, how do i make sure it doesn't happen again?

replies.body:
If you re-download the client alone, not the actual game, shouldn't be too much of a download and may resolve the issue

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
